description: Ensure the posted request will not delete or modify an existing audit tag.
When flagged true, the referenced Audit Tag will be deleted.

Audit_TagObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Audit_TagObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Audit_TagObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: A reference to the Audit Tag.

Audit_Tag_Data.description: A unique identifier for the Audit Tag.
The name of the Audit Tag.
The option to set the Audit Tag to active or inactive.

Audit_Tag_SegmentObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Audit_Tag_SegmentObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Audit_Tag_SegmentObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Audit_Tag_Data.description: Specifies the Audit Tag Segments the user is allowed to add to the Audit Tag.

description: Element containing all Audit Tag data.

validation.validation: An audit tag with this name "[name]' already exists. Enter a unique name for the audit tag.
The audit tag name can't be empty. Enter a name for the audit tag.
